message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn! How about a slight adjustment to be a bit more equitable? This offer is better than what you'll get in the next round with the inflation.
You didn't offer enough, let's try this
Time is running out, Alice! This offer is more than generous considering the inflation. Let's be realistic and close this deal.
Getting desperate, Bob? I'll take a bit more
Alice, this is getting out of hand.  Accept this offer, or we both walk away with nothing.  Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
